pull.title: minor rework of SendMoney in rpcwallet
pull.body:
- rework the function to not log errors but use throw JSONRPCError
- remove a check for IsLocked() that is done in sendtoaddress and
  sendfrom RPC calls already
- cache GetBalance() return value, because it's possibly used twice

events.body:
ACK.
Passes all tests (`sendtoaddress` is heavily covered by tests and uses `SendMoney()`).

events.message:
minor rework of SendMoney in rpcwallet

- rework the function to not log errors but use throw JSONRPCError
- remove a check for IsLocked() that is done in sendtoaddress and
  sendfrom RPC calls already
- cache GetBalance() return value, because it's possibly used twice

comments.body: Why did you remove this part?
See commit msg `remove a check for IsLocked() that is done in sendtoaddress and sendfrom RPC calls already`.

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -310,33 +311,27 @@ Value getaddressesbyaccount(const Array& params, bool fHelp)
 
 void SendMoney(const CTxDestination &address, CAmount nValue, CWalletTx& wtxNew)
comments.body: Let's make the function static too

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -310,33 +311,27 @@ Value getaddressesbyaccount(const Array& params, bool fHelp)
 
 void SendMoney(const CTxDestination &address, CAmount nValue, CWalletTx& wtxNew)

comments.body: I'd generally prefer to keep double-checks like this.
